summary: One prisoner tells to another that he hid a very large amount of money before the arrest. Together they manage to escape, but this is where their adventures are just beginning.
cast: Gérard Depardieu|Jean Reno|Richard Berry|André Dussollier|Jean-Pierre Malo|Jean-Michel Noirey|Laurent Gamelon|Aurélien Recoing|Vincent Moscato|Ticky Holgado|Michel Aumont|Leonor Varela|Loic Brabant|Arnaud Cassand|Edgar Givry|Adrien Saint-Joré|Johan Libéreau|Guy Delamarche|Rebecca Potok|Stéphane Boucher|Ludovic Berthillot|Thierry René|Pierre Rousselle|Michaël Troude|Norbert Haberlick|Antoine Blanquefort|Eric Vanzetta|Dominique Parent|Luq Hamet|Gérard Renault|Pétronille Moss|Guillaume de Tonquédec|Jean Dell|Stéphane Jacquot|Philippe Brigaud|Thierry Nenez|François Gamard|Julien Cafaro|Valentin Merlet|Romain Redler|Armelle Deutsch|Alain Fourès|Arnaud Le Bozec|Léon Clémence|Michel Caccia|Luc Bernard|Fabrice Bousba|Patrick Médioni|Gilles Conseil|Patrice Cols|Eric Moreau|Pierre-Olivier Scotto
keywords: prison escape|odd couple|on the run|buddy movie|manhunt
title: ¡Que te calles!
